definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a garment, meaning dub., tunic (Thes) or leggings SAC:JPhil. xxvi (1899), 309; (prob. later insertion in text Id.:ib. 311 ff.) (Talm. (rare); √[[פטשׁ]] spread out acc. to K:§ 57 b) a));—pl. sf. [[פטישי הון]] Kt (prob. ´[[פְּטִי]]: K:§§ 54, 3 a)a); 57, b)a), Kmp:ad loc. M:78* al. ´[[פַּטִּי]]:), [[פַּטְּשֵׁיהוֹן]] Qr, Da 3:21; conj. on meaning v. in Behrm Bev Dr M:78*.
